duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide telehealth counseling and psychotherapy services to clients in a remote setting.
Adhere to a therapy-focused model, with zero administrative work, and maintain high standards of emotional and behavioral health care.
Balance a high volume of regular client referrals while delivering effective, evidence-based mental health counseling.
Manage counseling sessions and maintain accurate documentation using telehealth technology and platforms.
Promote behavioral health and emotional well-being through telehealth therapy, utilizing virtual mental health practices.
Collaborate with a remote team to provide support and guidance as a licensed mental health professional.
Engage in remote therapy, counseling, and psychotherapy activities while adhering to state licensing regulations.

education_certification.credential: Active state licensure as a Licensed Mental Health Counselor (LMHC), Licensed Clinical Social Worker (LCSW), Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist (LMFT), Licensed Professional Counselor (LPC), or Psychologist (PhD/PsyD)
